title: (x) First Republic Bank serif face - Adobe Garamond {Yves}
content:
I’ve been looking through all the usual sources but I can’t seem to find a match for this typeface. I find things close but that capital B is no where to be found.

Any help would be appreciated

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [identifont.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20080607144146/http:/typophile.com/files/identifont.gif) | 5.04 KB |

author: voiceof

comments.content: I think you may be right, I can’t find a match for the capital B but it’s pretty close everywhere else
The OpenType Pro version I linked to has swash caps.
